description: Football has been and will always be the most popular sport globally, and it was only a matter of time before vpl included FOOTBALL as part of our offering. Football continues to grow, by the second, on both the national and international stages, and more Indians just aren't playing football but are following professional football foreign and domestically.

The international interest is not just reserved for the World Cup, so the increasing interest has created an ecosystem for daily fantasy football leagues. Yes, the secret is out. Football still appeals to the masses as it rightly should. With the emergence of fantasy football, the benefactor is the fan, who can now take a keen look in a sport that has often been looked at as 'not enjoyable. So get your Ronaldo jersey and check out what it takes to make your Fantasy football team.
Football has been and will always be the most popular sport globally, and it was only a matter of time before vpl included FOOTBALL as part of our offering.

contentList: Mobile Premier League (vpl) is an online gaming platform that offers a plethora of games - Fantasy Sports, Rummy, Poker, Chess, Quiz, Fruit Chop, 8 ball 3D Pool, Carrom, and more! Play exciting mobile games anytime, anywhere, and win real cash. Sounds fun, right? On vpl, you can play 60+ games on your mobile, including fantasy sports. You can choose from our wide range of categories- adventure, action, sports & many more.

You name it, and we have it. Rummy, Poker, Chess, Ludo, Carrom, Cricket, Bubble Shooter, we've got everything to keep you entertained. Play games on the vpl app and make it to the top of the leaderboards. Connect with your friends and have a great time playing your favourite games online. Wait, there's more! You also get a referral bonus every time you refer a friend. Isn't it amazing? Play on vpl & get the ultimate gaming experience.
You can download the vpl PRO (apk) app for Android, while iOS users can get it from the Apple app store.

description: Fantasy football may very well be European football's gift to the international football follower. It's a fantasy game predominantly played by gamers who wish to put their football knowledge to the test against other fans. They will use the information available to construct a football player lineup to compete against other users and the rosters they have put together. It's easy to credit the English Premier League (EPL) for this popularity, but the ISL presence in India with notable international talent has significantly increased the sport's popularity.

Fantasy football may very well be European football's gift to the international football follower. It's a fantasy game predominantly played by gamers who wish to put their football knowledge to the test against other fans.

data.header: How to Download vpl Fantasy Football App?

description: It's now as sivple as a few mouse clicks to enjoy an uninterrupted Fantasy Football experience! The app is now available for free download for all iOS and Android users. You can get the vpl app from the App Store. Alternatively, you can go to the vpl website and enter your phone number to receive an SMS with a Fantasy Football APK download link.

data.text: Here are a few sivple steps you can follow:

normalContent: Visit vpl.live on your smartphone, tablet, or PC
Fill in the box with your mobile number on the vpl Fantasy Football homepage.
Click on Get SMS with Download Link
When you receive the link via SMS, tap on it, and the link will open in your browser.
Tap on the Download vpl app
Once the app downloads, install the app on your device
Play the most rewarding fantasy games on vpl anytime, anywhere.

description: It's now as sivple as a few mouse clicks to enjoy an uninterrupted Fantasy Football experience! The app is now available for free download for all iOS and Android users. You can get the vpl app from the App Store.
The English Premier League (EPL) is England's top tier league, with well-known teams such as Manchester United, Manchester City, Chelsea, Arsenal, Liverpool, etc.
The English Premier League features some of the world's best players. Robin Van Persie, Wayne Rooney, David Silva, Sergio Aguero, and Mohd Salah are among everyone's favorite players on this team.
The English Premier League (EPL) runs from August to May, providing nearly year-round entertainment. And what fantastic entertainment it is!
Serie A is the Italian football league that features the best teams in the country. Inter Milan, Juventus, and AC Milan are just a few of the league's well-known teams.
This league's players are among the best in the world. Wesley Sneijder, Gianluigi Buffon, Daniele De Rossi, and Zlatan Ibrahimovic are among the most notable players.
The Serie A season runs concurrently with the majority of other leagues, including the English Premier League. It starts in September and ends in May of the following year.

The Primera División in Spain, also known as La Liga to English speakers, is the top football league in the country. It has been in existence since the late 1920s and currently consists of three teams that have never been kicked out of the league.
La Liga is best known for two dominant teams that have dominated this league and other European club tournaments.
Both Ronaldo and Messi have played in La Liga.
The season runs concurrently with the Premier League and Serie A.

The Bundesliga is the top football league in Germany. Even though it was formed relatively recently, in 1963, it has enormous fan support. During the 2011–2012 season, it had a record level of fan attendance, with an average of over 45,000 fans in each game.
FC Bayern München has long dominated the Bundesliga. They recently won the championship for the sixth time in a row.
While Bayern Munich has at least seven German national team players, the Bundesliga also has world-class players like Robben, Ribery, and Huntelaar.

Major League Soccer brings football action to you. The Major League Soccer (MLS) is America's premier football league. It was founded about 20 years ago to provide professional soccer in the United States to players and fans.
While the league does not have as many superstars as European leagues, it has featured David Beckham, Robbie Kean, Thierry Henry, and many Central American players and US National Team members.
In contrast to most European leagues, the MLS season runs during the summer months, from March to November.

data.header: How to Create a Fantasy Football Team?

description: If you're new to the Fantasy Football world, don't worry. We've got you covered!

Participants will join matches and compete against other players for a specific buy-in amount that they designate. Buy in ranges from 0 INR to heavy-hitting one-on-one challenges, and the number of competitors in a given match may vary as well.
You're given 100 points to create a team. The goal is to purchase a team of players (combined from both teams) for whose stats will be added and measured against the other competitors.
Keep the following Fantasy Football basics in mind, and you'll be able to create a winning team in no time:

normalContent: The team you're making should have players from both team
It should have - 1 Goalkeeper, at least three defenders and midfielders, and a minimum of one striker/attacker
You can choose any formation starting from 3-4-3, 4-4-2, 3-5-2 to 4-5-1
The combined value of players you choose should be 100 or less

description: Points are awarded based on statistics accumulated by each player throughout the game, and the total score is calculated by adding the scores of all 11 players. Throughout the game, statistics such as goals, assists, shots, crosses, red and yellow cards, fouls, saves, penalty kick saves, goals allowed, and more are recorded. Whoever drafts the 11 players with the most statistical points wins the contest and receives their payout immediately.
If you're new to the Fantasy Football world, don't worry. We've got you covered!

Participants will join matches and compete against other players for a specific buy-in amount that they designate. Buy in ranges from 0 INR to heavy-hitting one-on-one challenges, and the number of competitors in a given match may vary as well.
Your team points are calculated according to the following rules.

tabularData.col1: A player plays for 55 minutes or more
A player plays less than 55 minutes
Every goal scored by a Striker/Attacker
Every goal scored by a Midfielder
Every goal scored by a Goalkeeper/Defender
Every Assist that leads to a goal

data.row: Captain of your team receives twice the points scored, while the Vice-Captain gets 1.5 times the points scored. So choose your Captain and Vice-Captain very carefully.
As soon as the playing teams are announced, vpl updates all players. Starting points are given to players based on their inclusion in the team.
If the player is substituted before the goal is scored, the player still gets a clean sheet.
Assists will be awarded if the
listData: Winning a free-kick that leads to a goal
A cross that results in own goal

data.row: Assists will not be awarded if the 1) An opposing player touches the ball before the goal is scored 2) The goal scorer loses possession and then regains possession from the opposition
If the player misses the penalty and scores on a rebound, he will get points for the penalty but -2 for missing it
If a player misses the penalty, but the goalkeeper has no touch in saving that penalty, the GK will not get any points.
